item.title: My Economics Knowledge
item.description: When I write about a world without hunger curi (Elliot Temple) wonders what I know about economics. The Basics There is a supply of goods and services. There is demand for those goods and services. The prices of goods and services are related to supply and demand. If a good or service is scarce the price can be higher than when that same good or service is abundant assuming all other variables like demand are the same.
